PathOfBuilding.Notes:
^xB97123^xC8C8C8^7^xB97123Skeletons League Starter 3.17 Gem Leveling Guide
Leveling Loot Filter (Trade and SSF Leagues) - ^7Visit the following link for the custom leveling loot filter > use "Skele Leveling Trade and SSF"^7^7 ^x3F6DB3https://www.pathofexile.com/account/view-profile/Sylow/item-filters^xB97123
^xC8C8C8_____________________________________________^7
For gems, please keep in mind that we are getting gems for both the melee and mages versions of the build. You'll use the melee gem links until you can purchase or find a Dead Reckoning jewel. At that point you can stop using and getting melee gems and only get and use skele mages gems ^xC8C8C8_____________________________________________^7^7
^xB97123ACT 1^7
^7^xD02090Hillock Reward^7^7^7 ^x7070FFFreezing Pulse^7
^xD02090After Hillock Vendor (Nessa)^7 ^x7070FFRaise Zombie^7 Cost: 1 x Scroll of Wisdom
^xD02090Mercy Mission Reward^7 ^x7070FFSummon Phantasm Support^7
^xD02090After Mercy Mission Vendor (Nessa)^7 ^x70FF70Volley Support^7 (for mages. just level up for now)^7 Cost: 1 x Scroll of Wisdom
^xD02090The Flooded Depths^7 ^xC8C8C8Passive Point^7
^xD02090Breaking Some Eggs Reward^7 ^x7070FFSummon Raging Spirit^7
^xD02090Breaking Some Eggs Reward 2^7 ^x7070FFFrostblink^7
^xD02090After Breaking Some Eggs Vendor (Nessa)^7 ^xE05030Holy Flame Totem^7 ^x7070FFFlame Wall^7 Cost: 3 x Scroll of Wisdom
^xD02090Lower Prison^7 ^xC8C8C8Trial of Ascendancy^7
^xD02090The Caged Brute Reward^7 ^x7070FFMinion Damage Support^7
^xD02090The Caged Brute Reward 2^7 ^x7070FFSummon Skeletons^7
^xD02090After The Cage Brute Vendor (Nessa)^7 ^xE05030Melee Splash Support^7 ^x7070FFCombustion Support Flame Dash Minion Damage Support^7 ^xE05030Vitality^7 Cost: 5 x Orb of Transmutation
^xD02090The Ship Graveyard^7 ^xC8C8C8Passive Point^7
^xD02090The Siren's Cadence ^7^xC8C8C8Take whatever, we won't use it^7
^xD02090After The Siren's Cadence Vendor (Nessa)^7 ^x7070FFBone Offering^7 Cost: 1 x Orb of Transmutation
^xB97123ACT 2^7
^xD02090Bandits^7 KILL ALL
^xD02090The Crypt Level 1^7 ^xC8C8C8Trial of Ascendancy^7
^xD02090Chamber of Sins Level 2^7 ^xC8C8C8Trial of Ascendancy^7
^xD02090Intruders in Black Reward^7 ^x70FF70Desecrate^7
^xD02090After Intruders in Black Vendor (Yeena)^7 ^x7070FFSummon Skitterbots Tempest Shield^7 Cost: 2 x Orb of Alteration
^xD02090The Western Forest (Way Forward)^7 ^xC8C8C8Passive Point^7
^xD02090Sharp and Cruel Reward^7 ^x7070FFElemental Focus Support^7 ^xD02090 After Sharp and Cruel Vendor (Yeena)^7 ^xE05030Melee Physical Damage Support^7 ^x7070FFIncreased Critical Damage Support Minion Life Support^7 ^xE05030Melee Physical Damage Support^7 Cost: 4 x Orb of Alteration
^xD02090After Root of the Problem Vendor (Yeena)^7
